meaning: defeat, negative, -, minus, bear, owe, assume a responsibility

onyomiExamples.meaning: burden, load (e.g. CPU time, electricity, etc.)
positive and negative, +-, plus and minus

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to lose, to be defeated, to succumb, to give in, to surrender, to yield, to be inferior to, to break out in a rash due to (e.g. lacquer, shaving, etc.), to reduce the price, to give a discount, to throw in (something extra) for free
he that fights and runs away may live to fight another day, sometimes you have to lose to win, losing is winning
to bear, to carry on one's back, to take responsibility for, to accept a duty, to receive (wound), to incur (damage), to be injured, to owe

kunyomiExamples.example: 負うた子に教えられて浅瀬を渡る
kunyomiExamples.reading: おうたこにおしえられてあさせをわたる
kunyomiExamples.meaning: some things can be learned from the young, a fool may give a wise man counsel, to be led across the shallows by the child on one's shoulders
